oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Set mappings on 4-tuples
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mohsenipour, Shahram
Shelah, Saharon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Logic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we study set mappings on 4-tuples. We continue a previous work of Komjath and Shelah by getting new finite bounds on the size of free sets in a generic extension. This is obtained by an entirely different forcing construction. Moreover we prove a ZFC result for set mappings on 4-tuples and also as another application of our forcing construction we give a consistency result for set mappings on triples.
Comment: Accepted to be published in Notre Dame Journal of Formal Logic
